item.title: That It Will Never Come Again by Emily Dickinson
item.description: That it will never come again Is what makes life so sweet. Believing what we donâ€™t believe Does not exhilarate. That if it be, it be at best An ablative estate – This instigates an appetite Precisely opposite.
